channel.title: Crashers, Spammers and Nullers
channel.description: Alright one of my idiot players spammed Deltascape. Now I have a shitload of spammers that keep coming on my server. After I IP ban them the servers keeps rejecting them but after a while it starts nulling the server. I really need to fix this.. :(. Source is delta. Also I need a in-depth guide please I'm not very experienced with Java.

item.title: Crashers, Spammers and Nullers
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

Yes, I believe so I’ll try once more.

Read full topic

item.title: Crashers, Spammers and Nullers
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

I found where to put if (num > 2) { banHost(host, num); return false;
I tried making it to 1 or 2 before but I could still login multiple times.

Read full topic

item.title: Crashers, Spammers and Nullers
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

no…

In server.java just search for

if (num > 5) { banHost(host, num); return false;

Now replace that with this.

if (num > 2) { banHost(host, num); return false;

Thus ban’s people that have more than 2 accounts on.

Read full topic

item.title: Crashers, Spammers and Nullers
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:6, topic:318014”]search for logout

also in server.java add this

under public void banHost(String host, int num) {

find the code under, replace your current one with this one.

if (num > 2) { banHost(host, num); return false;
.[/quote]
This is my entire banHost or whatever,

[code] public void banHost(String host, int num) {
if (false) {
banned.add(host);
} else {
try {
misc.println(“BANNING HOST " + host + " (flooding)”);
banned.add(host);
delay = 2000;
delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

}[/code]

So i replace all that with just if (num > 2) { banHost(host, num); return false;
Also, do i search for logout in client class or server class. If you mean in server class then I did not find it. Thanks for all the replies everyone, really appreciate the help.

Read full topic

item.title: Crashers, Spammers and Nullers
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

search for logout

also in server.java add this

under public void banHost(String host, int num) {

find the code under, replace your current one with this one.

if (num > 2) { banHost(host, num); return false;
.

Read full topic

@runescapepkserver wrote:

Bro it’s starting again. I’m having trouble finding the Process method and Logout method. Could you possibly tell me what to search for?

item.title: Crashers, Spammers and Nullers
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

[quote=“runescapepkserver, post:3, topic:318014”][quote author=djdoyle1 link=topic=414525.msg3051423#msg3051423 date=1260117529]
Add this in your process method:

if(playerName == null || playerName == "null") { PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName; appendToBanned(playerName); }
[/quote]
In server class correct?[/quote]
Yeh and in your logout method

Read full topic
